name: Wachende Augen in den Bäumen
description: A spirit of rivers and sunlight, powerful in growth and movement.
abilities: 1. Use Presence to gain energy.
2. Move Dahan and defend against invaders.
3. Add additional damage when reclaiming lands.

name: Unterirdisch lauernde Reißzähne
description: A spirit of the earth, sturdy and enduring, able to protect lands.
abilities: 1. Create defensive barriers in your lands.
2. Manipulate the terrain to push invaders.
3. Strengthen Dahan in adjacent lands.

name: Pfeilschneller Blitzschlag
description: A swift spirit that strikes fear into the hearts of invaders with thunderous power.
abilities: 1. Gain energy rapidly through storms.
2. Strike down invaders with lightning bolts.
3. Quick movement across the board.

name: Lebenskraft der Erde
description: A spirit of shadows, using stealth and cunning to protect the land.
abilities: 1. Conceal your presence to evade invaders.
2. Manipulate fear among the invaders.
3. Create illusions to confuse enemies.

name: Bodenloser Schlamm der Sümpfe
description: A fierce spirit that unleashes destruction and chaos among invaders.
abilities: 1. Ignite lands to cause damage.
2. Gain energy from destruction.
3. Create a burning presence that invaders fear.

name: Sonnengenährter Fluss
description: A nurturing spirit that uses water to protect and reclaim lands.
abilities: 1. Pull invaders into the depths.
2. Use water to heal the land.
3. Generate tidal waves to displace enemies.
